    • Constructor Detail

      • Motorcycle

        public Motorcycle​(java.lang.String mod,
                  int a,
                  java.lang.String plate,
                  boolean electric)
        This function serves as a constructor of the class Motorcycle
        Parameters:
        mod - A string with the model name
        a - An integer with the purchase date
        plate - A string with the plate number
        electric - A bool that contains whether the motorcycle is electric or not

      • Motorcycle

        public Motorcycle​(java.lang.String mod,
                  int a,
                  java.lang.String plate,
                  boolean electric,
                  User owner)
        This function serves as a constructor of the class Motorcycle in case you indicate the owner
        Parameters:
        mod - A string with the model name
        a - An integer with the purchase date
        plate - A string with the plate number
        electric - A bool that contains whether the motorcycle is electric or not
        owner - A parameter of type user which contains the owner of the motorcycle

        Overrides:
        getPollutionIndex in class Vehicle
        Returns:
        It returns A as the pollution index if the motorcycle is electric and if not it calls to the original getPollutionIndex function
